title: Alagnak Wild River: Mammals
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Mammals                Mammals         Brown bears compete with anglers for fish on the Alagnak Wild River. NPS Photo  The diversity of life found along the Alagnak Wild River corridor includes brown bear, beaver, river otter, lynx, mink, fox, wolverine, and occasionally wolf. Large ungulates include moose and caribou.
